forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
